title: Apply Flash Sale Pricing
description: A marketing manager wants to apply a 24-hour 20% discount to an entire category of products for a flash sale.

tasks.description: Identify all products within the 'Summer Collection' category.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of all SKUs in the specified category.

tasks.description: Apply a 20% discount to all identified products with an expiration of 24 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully runs a bulk update to apply the promotional pricing.
